original_title: La Lunga Notte Di Abby Taylor
overview: Oppenheim, Germany, May 1945. The war is in its final epilogue. Adolf Hitler committed suicide and Nazi troops are capitulating strait from the grip of the Allied forces. In a small English field hospital conducted by Dr. Smith, are working Abby Taylor and Adele Evans, two brave nurses who take care of so many wounded soldiers from the front. While the British soldiers occupying Germany commit rapes and violence against young German women, the Nazi officer Adonis Hoffman, with his wife Beatrix and some loyalists, bursts in the field hospital and seeks refuge to escape arrest. Starts a long night for Abby Taylor full of horror and violence that will have its final epilogue many years later.
title: World On Fire: Abby Taylor's Long Night
